item.title: Atmo Sfera Platterless Turntable Spins Vinyl in the Air
item.description:
Atmo Sfera Platterless Turntable Spins Vinyl in the Air

Chicago's Gramovox already defied gravity with their vertical Floating Record Player, and now Italian start-up Audio Deva offers their own "upside-down" take on a turntable. It eschews the basic design that has "remained the same for about a century."

item.title: Ossic headphones create 3D audio unique to you
item.description:
Ossic headphones create 3D audio unique to you

When you're wandering around in Jurassic Park and you hear a T-Rex roar, you run in the other direction. It's just good sense. No one wants to end their day - or their life - as an apex predator's lunch.

item.title: Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set
item.description:
Moleskine's Comprehensive Smart Writing Set

At a conference on productivity-which touched on everything from the importance of tech-free alone time to the educational and emotional benefits of writing by hand (as outlined in a series of studies on the subject)- Moleskine unveiled their latest analog-to-digital wonder.

item.title: 50 Apps and Websites to Optimize Your Vacation
item.description:
50 Apps and Websites to Optimize Your Vacation

Everyone has an airport horror story. But you can make the most of a bad situation with apps like Flight+, which will keep you abreast of the latest delays and gate changes. And if you need a shower, unlimited Wi-Fi, or a work space during your extended layover, LoungeBuddy will alert you as to which free and pay-as-you-go lounges are available.

item.title: From Science Fiction to Reality: The Evolution of Artificial Intelligence
item.description:
From Science Fiction to Reality: The Evolution of Artificial Intelligence

What was once just a figment of the imagination of some our most famous science fiction writers, artificial intelligence (AI) is taking root in our everyday lives. We're still a few years away from having robots at our beck and call, but AI has already had a profound impact in more subtle ways.
